name: MORIGAON MAHILA MEHFIL
briefDescription: The MMM was founded in the year 1979 by the initiative of a women group. It has completed 38 years now. During this  long period the MMM rendering several social welfare activities  in various sectors like health, education, income generating programme , women empowerment , women right , vocational training, disaster risk deduction, rural housing and sanitation ,WASH,  family Counseling , legal literacy and legal aid,  Anganwadi workers and helpers training , relief, response and rehabilitation  for flood affected people , mental health programme ,  child care, protection and placement  through adoption   etc.
